abstract: Mark Burnett and Jeff Probst are at it again: the 15th installment of the powerhouse franchise “Survivor” premieres tonight at 8 p.m. on CBS. This time, the 16 American contestants will be transported to China.
lead_paragraph: Mark Burnett and Jeff Probst are at it again: the 15th installment of the powerhouse franchise “Survivor” premieres tonight at 8 p.m. on CBS. This time, the 16 American contestants will be transported to China.
